verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
HE IS EXALTED,
The King is exalted on high, I will praise Him.
He is exalted, forever exalted and I will praise His
name!
He is the Lord, forever His truth shall reign.
Heaven and earth rejoice in His holy name.
He is exalted, the King is exalted on high!
